title: Erik: 牌子必须有每行的信息 否则不显示
author: chyx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2015-12-8 18:43 编辑 

Erik Broes
It now only accepts proper json for each line and each line has to exist.
It will show as an empty sign otherwise.

牌子只接受合适的json信息且每行都要存在 否则不显示


来源bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-87143
